text: this one right here there was more rain
coming so the flooding was only gonna
continue or get worse and so we just
needed to get get people out get people
to safety I live about 15 miles north of
Dickinson the hardest part was probably
just getting to where the action was
going on where the where the need was
the power of social media showed itself
in a good way I was getting tagged and
messaged by everyone that I am I
probably got 40 or 50 different messages
about somebody's loved one that was
looking to get out there are a lot of
people stuff and we got about a hundred
people out so we cleared an entire
neighborhood
when I got there and I saw housing
people that are actually bringing out it
was like wow I would want somebody to be
there doing the same thing if I were in
that position
